phase.name: Public Viewer and Publishing
phase.goal: Expose published exhibition versions via public URLs without login and separate viewer vs. planner modes.

in.item: Public viewer route /exhibition/:slug serving the published version

out.item: No videos/3D models yet (still only 2D from earlier phases, unless Phase7 is already done)
Viewing is open to all, but editing remains restricted to @hsbi.de accounts

backend.item: Add PATCH /versions/:id/publish to set a version as published and unset others for the same exhibition.
Implement GET /exhibitions/:slug/published to return the published version state without requiring authentication.

frontend.item: In planner, allow curator/admin to mark a version as published.
Implement viewer route /exhibition/:slug that loads the published version without requiring auth.
Hide all editing controls in viewer; keep only navigation, crosshair, and info overlays.
Viewer should not show any indication of the @hsbi.de email restriction (only curators need to know this).

successCriteria.item: A public user can open /exhibition/:slug, walk through the room, and see info for artworks.
Curators with @hsbi.de accounts can change which version is publicly visible by toggling "published".
